column5: JCP not even heavy volume today just like another trading day Market may finally be realizing no place to go but up Is Jill Soltau the right person to lead the team going to find out Passionate today on the ER call she either needs to break out of her shell between ER calls or find someone who is in that 12 person EVP SVP team that can represent the company and keep all of us informed of progress The analyst day needs to be way before EOQ 2 babies are usually a 9 month window so make something happen Jill Some of the back drop numbers are good debt is manageable with FCF of 171m debt is 160m over next 2 years most debt is 2036 GM hanging at 35 liquidity 175b inventory is down 29 from Q4 2018 need SSS to improve Omni to be seamless Salons refreshed to todays look Kick MACYS a move it Jill
